title: Angel Stone v2.1.1 Mod apk
description:
Hack and slash through the demonic Legion and save the world from destruction.
Join the Resistance hero, with Angel Stone your adventure awaits!

Angel Stone, Action RPG, is a hardcore hack and slash dungeon crawler of biblical proportions!

Choose from three classes, Berserker, Gunslinger, or Shadow Mage and explore 60+ missions in a beautifully rendered fully 3D world!
Enjoy fun, fully cross-platform play! Gather the power of the fallen angels and enter the world of Angel Stone!
